Help:Node.title: Time
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Real Time vs. In-Character Time
Important Commands: @time, @ictime
There are two helpful commands for the telling of time from within IronClaw Online. The first uses @TIME which produces the current real time and date according to EST/Skotos. The layout for this looks like:
OOC -- It is now Thu Jan 19 15:14:11 2006 Skotos Time.
The In-Character time command is @ICTIME and the layout looks like this:
It is Jeudi, the nineteenth day of Yule. The current year is 882 Apres le Miracle.
It is midnight.
